text: Insofar as the Board shall conduct a school lunch program under the authority of §§ 38-801 to 38-807, it shall be considered a "school" within the meaning of the National School Lunch Act (42 U.S.C. § 1751 et seq.), and all funds to which it may thus become entitled as a participating school under the National School Lunch Act shall be deposited in the General Fund as provided in § 38-804.
historical:

1973 Ed., § 31-1407.

Legislative History of Laws
